data.title: Gabriela Mistral Foundation
data.text:
To commemorate this important event, the Gabriela Mistral Foundation (US), is organizing a series of activities that will be held throughout the year to celebrate the anniversary of Gabriela Mistral’s Nobel Prize in Literature. Mistral was the first Latin American writer and to this date the only Latin American woman to be awarded this most important recognition.

“At this moment, by an undeserved stroke of fortune, I am the direct voice of the poets of my race and the indirect voice for the noble Spanish and Portuguese tongues. . . . ” –Gabriela Mistral, December 10, 1945 – Stockholm, Sweden

The Gabriela Mistral Foundation wishes to thank the Nobel Academy and the people of Sweden for recognizing the poetry and writings of Gabriela Mistral.

We invite you to help us celebrate and if you would like to be included in our email list and receive the news and updates of this activities please send an email to info@gabrielamistralfoundation.org
